children.content:
<svg
xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"
viewBox="0 0 ${:width} ${:height}"
x="0" y="0"
>
    <style>

.classname {
    fill: #000;
    stroke: #000;
    stroke-width:1;
    stroke-dasharray:2 2;
    stroke-dashoffet:0;
    stroke-linecap: ${:butt}${:round}${:square};
    stroke-linejoin: ${:miter}${:round}${:bevel};
    /* stroke-miterlimit:0; */
}
    </style>

    <defs>
        <!-- Definition area (non visible) ! -->
    </defs>


    <!-- Draw what you want ! -->


</svg>
children.name: svg file 1
children.description: Svg file with prepositioned elements (style + defs)

children.content:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" viewBox="0 0 ${:width} ${:height}">


    <!-- Draw what you want ! -->


</svg>
children.name: svg file 2

children.content:
<svg viewBox="0 0 ${:width} ${:height}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" >
    <defs>
        <pattern id="gridx16" x="0" y="0" width="16" height="16" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
            <rect x="0" y="0" width="16" height="16" fill="none" stroke="dodgerblue" stroke-width="0.25" />
        </pattern>
    </defs>
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="${:width}" height="${:height}" fill="url(#gridx16)" />
</svg>
children.name: svg file 3

children.content: <text x="${:x}" y="${:y}" dx="${:dx}" dy="${:dy}" text-anchor="${:start}${:middle}${:end}" font-size="12">${:text}</text>
children.name: text

children.content: <radialGradient id="${:gradientId}" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%" fx="50%" fy="50%" fr="50%" ">${:stop-collection}</radialGradient>
children.name: radial gradient

children.content: <marker id="${:markerid}" viewBox="0 0 8 8" refX="${:refX}" refY="${:refY}" markerWidth="${:markerWidth}" markerHeight="${:markerHeight}" orient="auto-start-reverse">${:shapes…}</marker>
children.name: marker

children.content:
<!-- Svg Lines | Grids -->

<svg
xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"
xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
viewBox="0 0 384 384"
>


    <defs>

        <pattern id="svgrid16" x="0" y="0" width="16" height="16" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
            <rect x="0" y="0" width="16" height="16" fill="none" stroke="dodgerblue" stroke-width="0.25" />
        </pattern>

        <pattern id="svgrid8" x="0" y="0" width="8" height="8" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
            <rect x="0" y="0" width="8" height="8" fill="none" stroke="dodgerblue" stroke-width="0.25" />
        </pattern>

        <pattern id="svgrid4" x="0" y="0" width="4" height="4" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
            <rect x="0" y="0" width="4" height="4" fill="none" stroke="dodgerblue" stroke-width="0.25" />
        </pattern>

        <pattern id="svgrid2" x="0" y="0" width="2" height="2" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
            <rect x="0" y="0" width="2" height="2" fill="none" stroke="dodgerblue" stroke-width="0.25" />
        </pattern>



        <pattern id="circleGrid" x="0" y="0" width="8" height="8" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
            <circle cx="4" cy="4" r="4" fill="none" stroke="dodgerblue" stroke-width="0.5" />
        </pattern>

        <pattern id="isomGrid" x="50%" y="50%" width="14" height="8" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
            <path d="M0 4 l7 -4 l7 4 l-7 4z" fill="none" stroke="dodgerblue" stroke-width="0.5" />
        </pattern>

        <pattern id="circleIsomGrid" x="50%" y="50%" width="14" height="8" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse" fill="none" stroke="dodgerblue" stroke-width="0.5">
            <circle cx="7" cy="4" r="3" />
            <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="3" />
            <circle cx="14" cy="0" r="3" />
            <circle cx="0" cy="8" r="3" />
            <circle cx="14" cy="8" r="3" />
        </pattern>

        <pattern id="ellipsIsomGrid" x="50%" y="50%" width="14" height="8" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse" fill="none" stroke="dodgerblue" stroke-width="0.5">
            <ellipse cx="7" cy="4" rx="3.5" ry="2" />
            <ellipse cx="0" cy="0" rx="3.5" ry="2" />
            <ellipse cx="14" cy="0" rx="3.5" ry="2" />
            <ellipse cx="0" cy="8" rx="3.5" ry="2" />
            <ellipse cx="14" cy="8" rx="3.5" ry="2" />
        </pattern>

    </defs>




    <!-- GRID 16x16 -->
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="128" height="128" fill="url(#svgrid16)" />

    <!-- GRID 8x8 -->
    <rect x="128" y="0" width="128" height="128" fill="url(#svgrid8)" />

    <!-- GRID 4x4 -->
    <rect x="256" y="0" width="128" height="128" fill="url(#svgrid4)" />

    <!-- GRID 2x2 -->
    <rect x="0" y="128" width="128" height="128" fill="url(#svgrid2)" />

    <!-- GRID 16x16 + 8x8 + 2x2 -->
    <rect x="128" y="128" width="128" height="128" fill="url(#svgrid16)" fill-opacity="1" />
    <rect x="128" y="128" width="128" height="128" fill="url(#svgrid8)" fill-opacity="0.75" />
    <rect x="128" y="128" width="128" height="128" fill="url(#svgrid2)" fill-opacity="0.5" />




    <!-- CIRCLE GRID 8x8 -->
    <rect x="256" y="128" width="128" height="128" fill="url(#circleGrid)" />

    <!-- ISO GRID 14x8 -->
    <rect x="0" y="256" width="128" height="128" fill="url(#isomGrid)" />

    <!-- ISO CIRCLE GRID 14x8 -->
    <rect x="128" y="256" width="128" height="128" fill="url(#circleIsomGrid)" />

    <!-- ISO ELLIPSE GRID 14x8 -->
    <rect x="256" y="256" width="128" height="128" fill="url(#ellipsIsomGrid)" />

</svg>
children.name: example 0 - Grids

children.content:
<!-- Svg Lines | Shapes -->

<svg
xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"
xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
viewBox="0 0 384 384"
>




    <!-- CIRCLE / ELLIPSE -->
    <g transform="translate(0,0)">
        <circle cx="32" cy="64" r="24"/>
        <ellipse cx="72" cy="64" rx="12" ry="24"/>
        <ellipse cx="96" cy="64" rx="6" ry="24"/>
        <ellipse cx="112" cy="64" rx="3" ry="24"/>
    </g>


    <!-- RECT -->
    <g transform="translate(128,0)">
        <rect x="24" y="24" width="32" height="32"/>
        <rect x="64" y="24" width="40" height="32" rx="3"/>
        <rect x="24" y="64" width="32" height="40" rx="6"/>
        <rect x="64" y="64" width="40" height="40" rx="12"/>
    </g>


    <!-- POLYGON 1 -->
    <g transform="translate(256,0)">
        <polygon points="24, 24 104,24 24,104"/>
        <polygon points="104,32 104,104 68,68"/>
        <polygon points="64,104 64,72 96,104"/>
        <polygon points="32,104 58,78 58,104"/>
    </g>


    <!-- POLYGON 2 -->
    <g transform="translate(0,128)">
        <polygon class="random-polygon" points="40,96,16,101,93,18,34,50,75,59,59,110,19,81,88,49,78,91,46,90,103,108,92,16" fill-rule="nonzero"/>
    </g>


    <!-- TEXT -->
    <g transform="translate(128,128)" font-family="sans-serif">
        <text x="64" y="32" text-anchor="middle" font-size="12.7">circle, ellipse</text>
        <text x="64" y="44" text-anchor="middle" font-size="9.4">square, rectangle</text>
        <text x="64" y="64" text-anchor="middle" font-size="21.1">polygon</text>
        <text x="64" y="108" text-anchor="middle" font-size="50.25">line</text>
    </g>


    <!-- LINE -->
    <g transform="translate(256,128)" stroke="black" stroke-width="3">
        <line x1="24" y1="32" x2="104" y2="32"/>
        <line x1="24" y1="56" x2="104" y2="40"/>
        <line x1="24" y1="80" x2="104" y2="48"/>
        <line x1="24" y1="88" x2="104" y2="72"/>
        <line x1="24" y1="96" x2="104" y2="96"/>
    </g>


    <!-- POLYLINE -->
    <g transform="translate(0,256)">
        <polyline points="16,96 32,80 40,88 48,72 56,72 64,64 72,40 80,56 96,48 112,24" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="3"/>
    </g>


    <!-- PATH -->
    <g transform="translate(128,256)" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="3" stroke-linecap="butt">
        <path d="M24 24 h8 v8 h8 v-8 h8 v8 h8 v-8 h8 v8 h8 v-8 h8 v8 h8 v-8 h8 v8 h8 v-8 h1.5"/>
        <path d="M24 50 l16 -8 v8 l16 -8 v8 l16 -8 v8 l16 -8 v8 l16 -8 v8"/>
        <path d="M24 68 a 8 8 0 0 1 16 0 a 8 8 0 0 1 16 0 a 8 8 0 0 1 16 0 a 8 8 0 0 1 16 0 a 8 8 0 0 1 16 0"/>
        <path d="M24 80 q 20 -8 40 0 q 20  8 40 0"/>
        <path d="M24 96 c10 -8 10 8 20 0 c10 -8 10 8 20 0 c10 -8 10 8 20 0 c10 -8 10 8 20 0 "/>
    </g>


    <!-- POLYGON 3 -->
    <g transform="translate(256,256)">
        <polygon class="random-polygon" points="40,96,16,101,93,18,34,50,75,59,59,110,19,81,88,49,78,91,46,90,103,108,92,16" fill-rule="evenodd"/>
    </g>




</svg>
children.name: example 1 - Shapes

children.content:
<!-- Svg Lines | Paths -->

<svg
xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"
xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
viewBox="0 0 512 512"
>


    <style>

path { fill: none; stroke: dodgerblue; stroke-width: 1 }
circle { fill: dodgerblue; r: 2px; }

    </style>




    <g transform="translate(0,0)">
        <path d="M32 32 h64 v64 h-64"/>
        <circle cx="32" cy="32"/>
        <circle cx="96" cy="32"/>
        <circle cx="96" cy="96"/>
        <circle cx="32" cy="96"/>
    </g>

    <g transform="translate(128,0)">
        <path d="M32 32 h64 v64 h-64z"/>
        <circle cx="32" cy="32"/>
        <circle cx="96" cy="32"/>
        <circle cx="96" cy="96"/>
        <circle cx="32" cy="96"/>
        <circle cx="32" cy="96"/>
    </g>

    <g transform="translate(256,0)">
        <path d="M48 32 h32 v16 h16 v32 h-16 v16 h-32 v-16 h-16 v-32 h16z"/>
        <circle cx="48" cy="32"/>
        <circle cx="80" cy="32"/>
        <circle cx="80" cy="48"/>
        <circle cx="96" cy="48"/>
        <circle cx="96" cy="80"/>
        <circle cx="80" cy="80"/>
        <circle cx="80" cy="96"/>
        <circle cx="48" cy="96"/>
        <circle cx="48" cy="80"/>
        <circle cx="32" cy="80"/>
        <circle cx="32" cy="48"/>
        <circle cx="48" cy="48"/>
        <circle cx="48" cy="48"/>
    </g>

    <g transform="translate(384,0)">
        <path d="M48 32 h32 l16 16 v32 l-16 16 h-32 l-16-16 v-32z"/>
        <circle cx="48" cy="32"/>
        <circle cx="80" cy="32"/>
        <circle cx="96" cy="48"/>
        <circle cx="96" cy="80"/>
        <circle cx="80" cy="96"/>
        <circle cx="48" cy="96"/>
        <circle cx="32" cy="80"/>
        <circle cx="32" cy="48"/>
        <circle cx="32" cy="48"/>
    </g>




    <g transform="translate(0,128)">
        <path d="M64 32 l32 32 l-32 32 l-32-32z"/>
        <circle cx="64" cy="32"/>
        <circle cx="96" cy="64"/>
        <circle cx="64" cy="96"/>
        <circle cx="32" cy="64"/>
        <circle cx="32" cy="64"/>
    </g>

    <g transform="translate(128,128)">
        <path d="M64 96 a32 32 0 1 1 32-32 h-32z"/>
        <circle cx="64" cy="96"/>
        <circle cx="96" cy="64"/>
        <circle cx="64" cy="64"/>
        <circle cx="64" cy="64"/>
    </g>

    <g transform="translate(256,128)">
        <path d="M32 32 a 64 64 0 0 1 64 64 h-64z"/>
        <circle cx="32" cy="32"/>
        <circle cx="96" cy="96"/>
        <circle cx="32" cy="96"/>
        <circle cx="32" cy="96"/>
    </g>

    <g transform="translate(384,128)">
        <path d="M32 32 a 64 64 0 0 0 64 64 h-64z"/>
        <circle cx="32" cy="32"/>
        <circle cx="96" cy="96"/>
        <circle cx="32" cy="96"/>
        <circle cx="32" cy="96"/>
    </g>




    <g transform="translate(0,256)">
        <path d="M32 64 a32 32 0 0 0 32-32 a32 32 0 0 0 32 32 a32 32 0 0 0-32 32 a32 32 0 0 0-32-32z"/>
        <circle cx="32" cy="64"/>
        <circle cx="64" cy="32"/>
        <circle cx="96" cy="64"/>
        <circle cx="64" cy="96"/>
        <circle cx="32" cy="64"/>
        <circle cx="32" cy="64"/>
    </g>

    <g transform="translate(128,256)">
        <path d="M64 32 a32 32 0 0 1 0 64 a16 16 0 0 0 0-32 a16 16 0 0 1 0-32z"/>
        <circle cx="64" cy="32"/>
        <circle cx="64" cy="96"/>
        <circle cx="64" cy="64"/>
        <circle cx="64" cy="32"/>
        <circle cx="64" cy="32"/>
    </g>

    <g transform="translate(256,256)">
        <path d="M43 40 a32 32 0 1 1 0 48 a25 25 0 1 0 0-48z"/>
        <circle cx="43" cy="40"/>
        <circle cx="43" cy="88"/>
        <circle cx="43" cy="40"/>
        <circle cx="43" cy="40"/>
    </g>

    <g transform="translate(384,256)">
        <path d="M64 24 l23.5 72.25 l-61.5-44.5 h76 l-61.5 44.5z"/>
        <circle cx="64" cy="24"/>
        <circle cx="87.5" cy="96.25"/>
        <circle cx="26" cy="51.75"/>
        <circle cx="102" cy="51.75"/>
        <circle cx="40.5" cy="96.25"/>
        <circle cx="40.5" cy="96.25"/>
    </g>




    <g transform="translate(0,384)">
        <path d="M32 32 c0 32 64 32 64 64 h-64 c0-32 64-32 64-64z"/>
        <circle cx="32" cy="32"/>
        <circle cx="96" cy="96"/>
        <circle cx="32" cy="96"/>
        <circle cx="96" cy="32"/>
        <circle cx="96" cy="32"/>
    </g>

    <g transform="translate(128,384)">
        <path d="M32 64 a32 32 0 0 0 32-32 a32 32 0 0 1 32 32 a32 32 0 0 0-32 32 a32 32 0 0 1-32-32z"/>
        <circle cx="32" cy="64"/>
        <circle cx="64" cy="32"/>
        <circle cx="96" cy="64"/>
        <circle cx="64" cy="96"/>
        <circle cx="32" cy="64"/>
        <circle cx="32" cy="64"/>
    </g>

    <g transform="translate(256,384)">
        <path d="M64 32 c0 20 24 20 24 40 a24 24 0 0 1-48 0 c0-20 24-20 24-40z"/>
        <circle cx="64" cy="32"/>
        <circle cx="88" cy="72"/>
        <circle cx="40" cy="72"/>
        <circle cx="64" cy="32"/>
        <circle cx="64" cy="32"/>
    </g>

    <g transform="translate(384,384)">
        <path d="M64 32 a32 32 0 0 1 0 64 a32 32 0 0 1 0-64 m0 8 a12 24 0 0 1 0 48 a12 24 0 0 1 0-48z"/>
        <circle cx="64" cy="32"/>
        <circle cx="64" cy="96"/>
        <circle cx="64" cy="32"/>
        <circle cx="64" cy="40"/>
        <circle cx="64" cy="88"/>
        <circle cx="64" cy="40"/>
        <circle cx="64" cy="40"/>
    </g>




</svg>
children.name: example 2 - Paths

children.content:
<!-- Svg Lines | Styling -->

<svg
xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"
xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
viewBox="0 0 384 384"
>




    <!-- FILL -->
    <g transform="translate(0,0)">

        <circle cx="32" cy="32" r="12" fill="coral"/>
        <circle cx="64" cy="32" r="12" fill="royalBlue"/>
        <circle cx="96" cy="32" r="12" fill="mediumOrchid"/>

        <circle cx="32" cy="64" r="12" fill="dodgerBlue"/>
        <circle cx="64" cy="64" r="12" fill="crimson"/>
        <circle cx="96" cy="64" r="12" fill="DeepSkyBlue"/>

        <circle cx="32" cy="96" r="12" fill="limegreen"/>
        <circle cx="64" cy="96" r="12" fill="mediumPurple"/>
        <circle cx="96" cy="96" r="12" fill="orange"/>

    </g>

    <!-- STROKE -->
    <g transform="translate(128,0)">

    <g fill="none" stroke-width="4">

        <circle cx="32" cy="32" r="10" stroke="coral"/>
        <circle cx="64" cy="32" r="10" stroke="royalBlue"/>
        <circle cx="96" cy="32" r="10" stroke="mediumOrchid"/>

        <circle cx="32" cy="64" r="10" stroke="dodgerBlue"/>
        <circle cx="64" cy="64" r="10" stroke="crimson"/>
        <circle cx="96" cy="64" r="10" stroke="DeepSkyBlue"/>

        <circle cx="32" cy="96" r="10" stroke="limegreen"/>
        <circle cx="64" cy="96" r="10" stroke="mediumPurple"/>
        <circle cx="96" cy="96" r="10" stroke="orange"/>

    </g>

    </g>




    <!-- FILL-OPACITY -->
    <g transform="translate(256,0)">

    <g fill="crimson">
        <circle cx="32" cy="32" r="12" fill-opacity="1.0"/>
        <circle cx="48" cy="32" r="12" fill-opacity="0.75"/>
        <circle cx="64" cy="32" r="12" fill-opacity="0.5"/>
        <circle cx="80" cy="32" r="12" fill-opacity="0.25"/>
        <circle cx="96" cy="32" r="12" fill-opacity="0.1"/>
    </g>

    <g fill="dodgerblue">
        <circle cx="32" cy="96" r="12" fill-opacity="0.1"/>
        <circle cx="48" cy="96" r="12" fill-opacity="0.25"/>
        <circle cx="64" cy="96" r="12" fill-opacity="0.5"/>
        <circle cx="80" cy="96" r="12" fill-opacity="0.75"/>
        <circle cx="96" cy="96" r="12" fill-opacity="1.0"/>
    </g>

    </g>

    <!-- STROKE-OPACITY -->
    <g transform="translate(0,128)"  stroke-width="8" stroke-linecap="round">

        <path d="M24 32 h80" stroke="coral"/>
        <path d="M24 48 h80" stroke="mediumOrchid"/>
        <path d="M24 64 h80" stroke="crimson"/>
        <path d="M24 80 h80" stroke="deepSkyBlue"/>
        <path d="M24 96 h80" stroke="limegreen"/>

        <g stroke-opacity="0.5">
            <path d="M32 24 v80" stroke="coral"/>
            <path d="M48 24 v80" stroke="mediumOrchid"/>
            <path d="M64 24 v80" stroke="crimson"/>
            <path d="M80 24 v80" stroke="deepSkyBlue"/>
            <path d="M96 24 v80" stroke="limegreen"/>
        </g>

    </g>




    <!-- STROKE-WIDTH -->
    <g transform="translate(128,128)"  stroke="black">

        <line x1="24" y1="32" x2="104" y2="32" stroke-width="1"/>
        <line x1="24" y1="40" x2="104" y2="40" stroke-width="2"/>
        <line x1="24" y1="48" x2="104" y2="48" stroke-width="4"/>
        <line x1="24" y1="58" x2="104" y2="58" stroke-width="8"/>
        <line x1="24" y1="72" x2="104" y2="72" stroke-width="16"/>
        <line x1="24" y1="93" x2="104" y2="93" stroke-width="24"/>

    </g>

    <!-- STROKE-LINECAP -->
    <g transform="translate(0,256)" stroke="black" stroke-width="12">

        <line x1="24" y1="32" x2="104" y2="32" stroke-linecap="butt"/>
        <line x1="24" y1="64" x2="104" y2="64" stroke-linecap="round"/>
        <line x1="24" y1="96" x2="104" y2="96" stroke-linecap="square"/>

    </g>

    <!-- STROKE-LINEJOIN -->
    <g transform="translate(128,256)" stroke="black" stroke-width="16" fill="none">

        <path d="M24 24 l24 24 l32 -32 l24 24" stroke-linejoin="miter"/>
        <path d="M24 56 l24 24 l32 -32 l24 24" stroke-linejoin="round"/>
        <path d="M24 88 l24 24 l32 -32 l24 24" stroke-linejoin="bevel"/>

    </g>

    <!-- STROKE-DASHARRAY -->
    <g transform="translate(256,128)"  stroke="black">

        <g stroke-width="0.5">
            <path d="M24 24 h80" stroke-dasharray="1, 3"/>
            <path d="M24 32 h80" stroke-dasharray="2, 2"/>
            <path d="M24 40 h80" stroke-dasharray="3, 1"/>
        </g>
        <g stroke-width="8">
            <path d="M24 56 h80" stroke-dasharray="1, 3"/>
            <path d="M24 64 h80" stroke-dasharray="2, 2"/>
            <path d="M24 72 h80" stroke-dasharray="3, 1"/>
        </g>
        <g stroke-width="6" stroke-linecap="round">
            <path d="M24 88 h80" stroke-dasharray="0, 14"/>
            <path d="M24 96 h80" stroke-dasharray="0, 7"/>
            <path d="M24 104 h80" stroke-dasharray="7, 7"/>
        </g>

    </g>




    <!-- ? -->
    <g transform="translate(256,256)"></g>


</svg>
children.name: example 3 - Styling

children.content:
<!-- Svg Lines | Advanced -->

<svg
xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"
xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
viewBox="0 0 512 512"
>




    <defs>


        <linearGradient id="hotcold1" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="0%">
            <stop offset="0%" stop-color="crimson"/>
            <stop offset="100%" stop-color="dodgerblue"/>
        </linearGradient>
        <linearGradient id="hotcold2" x1="0%" y1="100%" x2="0%" y2="0%">
            <stop offset="0%" stop-color="crimson"/>
            <stop offset="100%" stop-color="dodgerblue"/>
        </linearGradient>
        <linearGradient id="hotcold3" x1="100%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="0%">
            <stop offset="0%" stop-color="crimson"/>
            <stop offset="100%" stop-color="dodgerblue"/>
        </linearGradient>

        <radialGradient id="hotcold4" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
            <stop offset="0%" stop-color="crimson"/>
            <stop offset="100%" stop-color="dodgerblue"/>
        </radialGradient>
        <radialGradient id="hotcold5" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
            <stop offset="50%" stop-color="crimson"/>
            <stop offset="70%" stop-color="dodgerblue"/>
        </radialGradient>
        <radialGradient id="hotcold6" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%" fx="80%" fy="80%">
            <stop offset="50%" stop-color="crimson"/>
            <stop offset="70%" stop-color="dodgerblue"/>
        </radialGradient>


        <pattern id="pattern1" x="0" y="0" width="16" height="16" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
            <circle cx="8" cy="8" r="8" stroke="black" stroke-width="3" fill="none"/>
        </pattern>
        <pattern id="pattern2" x="0" y="0" width="8" height="8" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
            <circle cx="4" cy="4" r="3" fill="white"/>
        </pattern>
        <pattern id="pattern3" x="0" y="0" width="16" height="16" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
            <circle cx="8" cy="8" r="8" fill="url(#hotcold2)"/>
        </pattern>


        <g id="unCercle">
            <circle r="16" fill="url(#hotcold1)"/>
            <path d="M -8 0 a 8 8 0 0 0  8 -8 a 8 8 0 0 0  8  8 a 8 8 0 0 0 -8  8 a 8 8 0 0 0 -8 -8" fill="white"/>
        </g>
        <symbol id="unCercleSymbol" width="32" height="32" viewbox="0 0 32 32">
            <circle cx="16" cy="16" r="16" fill="url(#hotcold1)"/>
            <path transform="translate(16,16)" d="M -8 0 a 8 8 0 0 0  8 -8 a 8 8 0 0 0  8  8 a 8 8 0 0 0 -8  8 a 8 8 0 0 0 -8 -8" fill="white"/>
        </symbol>


        <marker id="marker1" viewBox="0 0 16 16" refX="8" refY="8" markerWidth="8" markerHeight="8" orient="auto">
            <circle cx="8" cy="8" r="8" fill="crimson"></circle>
        </marker>
        <marker id="marker2" viewBox="0 0 16 16" refX="8" refY="8" markerWidth="16" markerHeight="16" orient="auto">
            <circle cx="8" cy="8" r="3" fill="dodgerblue"/>
        </marker>
        <marker id="marker3" viewBox="0 0 16 16" refX="8" refY="8" markerWidth="16" markerHeight="16" orient="auto">
            <circle cx="8" cy="8" r="8" fill="url(#hotcold1)"/>
            <path d="M13 8 l-7 4 v-8 z" fill="white"/>
        </marker>


    </defs>




    <!-- LINEAR GRADIENT 1 -->
    <g transform="translate(0,0)">
        <circle cx="64" cy="64" r="40" fill="url(#hotcold1)"/>
    </g>

    <!-- LINEAR GRADIENT 2 -->
    <g transform="translate(128,0)">
        <rect x="0" y="0" width="128" height="128" fill="url(#hotcold2)"/>
        <circle cx="64" cy="64" r="40" fill="url(#hotcold2)"/>
    </g>

    <!-- LINEAR GRADIENT 3 -->
    <g transform="translate(256,0)">
        <circle cx="64" cy="64" r="32" stroke="url(#hotcold3)" stroke-width="16" fill="none"/>
    </g>




    <!-- RADIAL GRADIENT 1 -->
    <g transform="translate(384,0)">
        <circle cx="64" cy="64" r="40" fill="url(#hotcold4)"/>
    </g>

    <!-- RADIAL GRADIENT 2 -->
    <g transform="translate(0,128)">
        <circle cx="64" cy="64" r="40" fill="url(#hotcold5)"/>
    </g>

    <!-- RADIAL GRADIENT 3 -->
    <g transform="translate(128,128)">
        <circle cx="64" cy="64" r="40" fill="url(#hotcold6)"/>
    </g>




    <!-- PATTERN 1 -->
    <g transform="translate(256,128)">
        <circle cx="64" cy="64" r="40" fill="url(#pattern1)"/>
    </g>

    <!-- PATTERN 2 -->
    <g transform="translate(384,128)">
        <rect x="0" y="0" width="128" height="128" fill="url(#hotcold2)"/>
        <circle cx="64" cy="64" r="40" fill="url(#pattern2)"/>
    </g>

    <!-- PATTERN 3 -->
    <g transform="translate(0,256)">
        <circle cx="64" cy="64" r="40" fill="url(#pattern3)"/>
    </g>




    <!-- MASK -->
    <g transform="translate(128,256)">
        <mask id="themask" maskContentUnits="objectBoundingBox">
            <rect width="100%" height="100%" fill="white"/>
            <path d="M0,0.5 a 0.5 0.5 0 0 0 0.5 -0.5 a 0.5 0.5 0 0 0 0.5 0.5 a 0.5 0.5 0 0 0 -0.5 0.5 a 0.5 0.5 0 0 0 -0.5 -0.5" fill="black"/>
        </mask>
        <rect width="128" height="128" fill="url(#hotcold1)"/>
        <circle cx="64" cy="64" r="40" fill="white" mask="url(#themask)"/>
    </g>

    <!-- CLIP PATH -->
    <g transform="translate(256,256)">
        <clipPath id="leClip" clipPathUnits="objectBoundingBox">
            <path d="M 0 0.5 a 0.5 0.5 0 0 0  0.5 -0.5 a 0.5 0.5 0 0 0  0.5  0.5 a 0.5 0.5 0 0 0 -0.5  0.5 a 0.5 0.5 0 0 0 -0.5 -0.5"/>
        </clipPath>
        <rect width="128" height="128" fill="url(#hotcold1)" fill-opacity="0.25"/>
        <g clip-path="url(#leClip)">
            <circle cx="64" cy="64" r="40" fill="url(#hotcold1)"/>
            <g fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="2">
                <circle cx="64" cy="64" r="20"/>
                <circle cx="64" cy="64" r="12"/>
                <circle cx="64" cy="64" r="4"/>
            </g>
        </g>
    </g>




    <!-- SYMBOL / USE-->
    <g transform="translate(384,256)">

        <!-- 1 -->
        <use href="#unCercleSymbol" x="48" y="16"/>
        <!-- <use xlink:href="#unCercle" x="64" y="32"/> -->

        <!-- 2 -->
        <use xlink:href="#unCercle" x="48" y="60"/>
        <use xlink:href="#unCercle" x="80" y="60"/>

        <!-- 3 -->
        <use xlink:href="#unCercle" x="32" y="88"/>
        <use xlink:href="#unCercle" x="64" y="88"/>
        <use xlink:href="#unCercle" x="96" y="88"/>

    </g>




    <!-- MARKER 1 -->
    <g transform="translate(0,384)">
        <path d="M32 64 a32 32 0 0 0 32-32 a32 32 0 0 0 32 32 a32 32 0 0 0-32 32 a32 32 0 0 0-32-32z" marker-mid="url(#marker1)" fill="dodgerblue"/>
    </g>

    <!-- MARKER 2 -->
    <g transform="translate(128,384)">
        <path d="M96.00 64.00 L92.33 78.87 L82.18 90.34 L67.86 95.77 L52.65 93.92 L40.05 85.22 L32.93 71.66 L32.93 56.34 L40.05 42.78 L52.65 34.08 L67.86 32.23 L82.18 37.66 L92.33 49.13 z" marker-mid="url(#marker2)" marker-start="url(#marker2)" fill="none" stroke="dodgerblue"/>
    </g>

    <!-- MARKER 3 -->
    <g transform="translate(256,384)">
        <path d="M96.00 64.00 L92.33 78.87 L82.18 90.34 L67.86 95.77 L52.65 93.92 L40.05 85.22 L32.93 71.66 L32.93 56.34 L40.05 42.78 L52.65 34.08 L67.86 32.23 L82.18 37.66 L92.33 49.13" marker-mid="url(#marker3)" marker-start="url(#marker3)" marker-end="url(#marker3)" fill="none"/>
    </g>




    <!-- ? -->
    <g transform="translate(384,384)"></g>


</svg>
children.name: example 4 - Advanced

children.content:
<!-- Svg Lines | Transform -->

<svg
xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"
xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
viewBox="0 0 384 384"
fill="none"
stroke="black"
>


    <defs>

        <pattern id="gridx128" x="0" y="0" width="128" height="128" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
            <rect x="0" y="0" width="128" height="128" stroke="dodgerblue" stroke-width="0.5"/>
        </pattern>

        <pattern id="gridx8" x="0" y="0" width="8" height="8" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
            <rect x="0" y="0" width="8" height="8" stroke="dodgerblue" stroke-width="0.25"/>
        </pattern>

    </defs>

    <!-- G R I D -->
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="384" height="384" stroke="none" fill="url(#gridx8)"/>
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="384" height="384" stroke="none" fill="url(#gridx128)"/>




    <!-- TRANSFORM TRANSLATE 1 -->
    <g transform="translate(0,0)">
        <circle cx="64" cy="64" r="24"/>
        <circle cx="64" cy="64" r="24" transform="translate(-32, 0)"/>
        <circle cx="64" cy="64" r="24" transform="translate( 32, 0)"/>
    </g>

    <!-- TRANSFORM TRANSLATE 2 -->
    <g transform="translate(128,0)">
        <circle r="24" transform="translate(64, 32)"/>
        <circle r="24" transform="translate(64, 64)"/>
        <circle r="24" transform="translate(64, 96)"/>
    </g>




    <!-- TRANSFORM ROTATE 1 -->
    <g transform="translate(256,0)">
        <rect x="40" y="40" width="48" height="48" stroke="#BBBBBB"/>
        <rect x="40" y="40" width="48" height="48" transform="rotate(22 0 0)"/>
    </g>

    <!-- TRANSFORM ROTATE 2 -->
    <g transform="translate(0,128)">
        <rect x="40" y="40" width="48" height="48" stroke="#BBBBBB"/>
        <rect x="40" y="40" width="48" height="48" transform="rotate(22 40 40)"/>
    </g>


    <!-- TRANSFORM ROTATE 3 -->
    <g transform="translate(128,128)">
        <rect x="40" y="40" width="48" height="48" stroke="#BBBBBB"/>
        <rect x="40" y="40" width="48" height="48" transform="rotate(22 64 64)"/>
    </g>





    <!-- TRANSFORM TRANSLATE + ROTATE 1 -->
    <g transform="translate(256,128)">
        <path d="M40 40 v16 a 16 16 0 1 1 16 -16 z"/>
        <path d="M88 40 v16 a 16 16 0 1 1 16 -16 z" transform="rotate( 90 88 40)"/>
        <path d="M88 88 v16 a 16 16 0 1 1 16 -16 z" transform="rotate(180 88 88)"/>
        <path d="M40 88 v16 a 16 16 0 1 1 16 -16 z" transform="rotate(270 40 88)"/>
    </g>

    <!-- TRANSFORM TRANSLATE + ROTATE 2 -->
    <g transform="translate(0,256)">
        <path d="M 0 0 v 16 a 16 16 0 1 1 16 -16 z"
        transform="translate(40, 40) rotate(  0 0 0)"/>
        <path d="M 0 0 v 16 a 16 16 0 1 1 16 -16 z"
        transform="translate(88, 40) rotate( 90 0 0)"/>
        <path d="M 0 0 v 16 a 16 16 0 1 1 16 -16 z"
        transform="translate(88, 88) rotate(180 0 0)"/>
        <path d="M 0 0 v 16 a 16 16 0 1 1 16 -16 z"
        transform="translate(40, 88) rotate(270 0 0)"/>
    </g>




    <!-- TRANSFORM SCALE 1 -->
    <g transform="translate(128,256)">
        <circle cx="64" cy="64" r="24" transform="scale(0.5, 0.5)"/>
        <circle cx="64" cy="64" r="24" transform="scale(0.75, 0.75)"/>
        <circle cx="64" cy="64" r="24" transform="scale(1, 1)"/>
        <circle cx="64" cy="64" r="24" transform="scale(1.25, 1.25)"/>
    </g>

    <!-- TRANSFORM SCALE 2 -->
    <g transform="translate(256,256)">
        <circle r="32" transform="translate(64,64) scale(0.5, 0.5)"/>
        <circle r="32" transform="translate(64,64) scale(0.75, 0.75)"/>
        <circle r="32" transform="translate(64,64) scale(1, 1)"/>
        <circle r="32" transform="translate(64,64) scale(1.25, 1.25)"/>
    </g>




</svg>
children.name: example 5 - Transform

children.content:
<!-- Svg Lines | Animate -->

<svg
xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"
xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
viewBox="0 0 512 512"
>




    <defs>

        <pattern id="gridx8" x="0" y="0" width="8" height="8" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
            <rect x="0" y="0" width="8" height="8" fill="none" stroke="dodgerblue" stroke-width="0.2"/>
        </pattern>
        <pattern id="gridx32" x="0" y="0" width="32" height="32" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
            <rect x="0" y="0" width="32" height="32" fill="none" stroke="dodgerblue" stroke-width="0.75"/>
        </pattern>

    </defs>




    <!-- G R I D -->
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="512" height="512" fill="url(#gridx8)"/>
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="512" height="512" fill="url(#gridx32)"/>




    <!-- ANIMATE ATTRIBUTE 1 - CY -->
    <g transform="translate(0,0)">
        <circle cx="64" cy="32" r="32">
            <animate attributeName="cy" from="32" to="96" dur="3s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
        </circle>
    </g>

    <!-- ANIMATE ATTRIBUTE 2 - CY + KEYTIMES -->
    <g transform="translate(128,0)">
        <circle cx="64" cy="32" r="32">
            <animate attributeName="cy" values="32;64;96" keyTimes="0;0.25;1" dur="3s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
        </circle>
    </g>

    <!-- ANIMATE ATTRIBUTE 3 - CX -->
    <g transform="translate(256,0)">
        <circle cx="64" cy="64" r="32">
            <animate attributeName="cx" values="32; 96; 32" dur="2s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
        </circle>
    </g>

    <!-- ANIMATE ATTRIBUTE 4 -CX + CY -->
    <g transform="translate(384,0)">
        <circle cx="64" cy="64" r="32">
            <animate attributeName="cx" values="32; 96; 32" dur="7s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
            <animate attributeName="cy" values="32; 96; 32" dur="3s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
        </circle>
    </g>

    <!-- ANIMATE ATTRIBUTE 5 - R -->
    <g transform="translate(0,128)">
        <circle cx="64" cy="64" r="32">
            <animate attributeName="r" values="4; 80; 4" dur="7s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
        </circle>
    </g>

    <!-- ANIMATE ATTRIBUTE 5 - R + KEYTIMES -->
    <g transform="translate(128,128)">
        <circle cx="64" cy="64" r="32">
            <animate attributeName="r" values="4; 80; 4" keyTimes="0;0.75;1" dur="7s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
        </circle>
    </g>

    <!-- ANIMATE ATTRIBUTE 6 - FILL -->
    <g transform="translate(256,128)">
        <circle cx="64" cy="64" r="32">
            <animate attributeName="fill" values="black; crimson; dodgerblue; black" dur="4s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
        </circle>
    </g>




    <!-- ANIMATE TRANSFORM 1 - TRANSLATE -->
    <g transform="translate(384,128)">
        <rect x="32" y="32" width="64" height="64">
            <animateTransform attributeName="transform" type="translate" values="-32 0; 32 0; -32 0" dur="4s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
        </rect>
    </g>

    <!-- ANIMATE TRANSFORM 1 - TRANSLATE + KEYTIMES -->
    <g transform="translate(0,256)">
        <rect x="32" y="32" width="64" height="64">
            <animateTransform attributeName="transform" type="translate" values="-32 0; 32 0; -32 0" keyTimes="0;0.25;1" dur="4s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
        </rect>
    </g>

    <!-- ANIMATE TRANSFORM 2 - ROTATE -->
    <g transform="translate(128,256)">
        <rect x="32" y="32" width="64" height="64">
            <animateTransform attributeName="transform" type="rotate" values="0 64 64; 360 64 64" dur="7.2s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
        </rect>
    </g>

    <!-- ANIMATE TRANSFORM 3 - SCALE -->
    <g transform="translate(256,256)">
        <rect x="32" y="32" width="64" height="64">
            <animateTransform attributeName="transform" type="scale" values="1 1; 1 1; 1.5 1.5; 1 1; 1 1; 0.5 0.5; 1 1" dur="4s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
        </rect>
    </g>

    <!-- ANIMATE TRANSFORM 4 - SCALE -->
    <g transform="translate(384,256)">
        <rect x="-32" y="-32" width="64" height="64" transform="translate(64,64)">
            <animateTransform attributeName="transform" type="scale" additive="sum" values="1 1; 1 1; 1.5 1.5; 1 1; 1 1; 0.5 0.5; 1 1" dur="4s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
        </rect>
    </g>




    <!-- ANIMATE MOTION 1 -->
    <g transform="translate(0,384)">
        <path id="circuit" d="M64 32 h24 a 8 8 0 0 1 8 8 v40 a 16 16 0 0 1 -16 16 a 8 8 0 0 1 -8 -8 v-24 a 16 16 0 0 0 -32 0 a 16 16 0 0 0 16 16 a 8 8 0 0 1 0 16 h-8 a16 16 0 0 1 -16 -16 v-16 a 32 32 0 0 1 32 -32z" fill="none" stroke="dodgerblue"/>
        <polygon points="-10,-6 10,0 -10,6">
            <animateMotion dur="7.2s" repeatCount="indefinite" rotate="0">
                <mpath href="#circuit"/>
            </animateMotion>
        </polygon>
    </g>

    <!-- ANIMATE MOTION 2 -->
    <g transform="translate(128,384)">
        <use xlink:href="#circuit"/>
        <polygon points="-10,-6 10,0 -10,6">
            <animateMotion dur="7.2s" repeatCount="indefinite" rotate="auto">
                <mpath href="#circuit"/>
            </animateMotion>
        </polygon>
    </g>

    <!-- ANIMATE MOTION 3 -->
    <g transform="translate(256,384)">
        <use xlink:href="#circuit"/>
        <polygon points="-10,-6 10,0 -10,6">
            <animateMotion dur="7.2s" repeatCount="indefinite" rotate="auto" keyTimes="0;0.75;1" keyPoints="0;0.5;1" calcMode="linear">
                <mpath href="#circuit"/>
            </animateMotion>
        </polygon>
    </g>

    <!-- ANIMATE MOTION 3 -->
    <g transform="translate(384,384)">
        <use xlink:href="#circuit"/>
        <polygon points="-10,-6 10,0 -10,6">
            <animateMotion dur="7.2s" repeatCount="indefinite" rotate="auto" keyTimes="0;0.25;1" keyPoints="0;0.5;1" calcMode="linear">
                <mpath href="#circuit"/>
            </animateMotion>
        </polygon>
    </g>




</svg>
children.name: example 6 - Animate
